<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/business/representative/as-owner"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



    Copies the business representative as an ultimate beneficial owner for the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `business:write`
